name: alfred
title: Alfred
desc: A modern SaaS template designed to feel polished and helpful.
article:
Alfred is a clean, flexible light-mode template that helps SaaS products launch fast, look professional, and stay easy to maintain.


  • Learn more about Alfred
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

  • Sign in
  • Sign up

(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Blog tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
